galleryView.emptyState: No cards yet. Add rows from the table view to populate this gallery.

toolbar.title: Gallery
toolbar.cannotDeleteLastGallery: Keep at least one gallery view.

templateModal.title: Gallery template
templateModal.filterSectionEmpty: No filter view yet. Create one to scope this gallery.

kanbanView.schemaUnavailable: Kanban view requires a valid table schema. Reload the note and try again.
kanbanView.missingLaneField: Kanban view needs the "{{field}}" column. Add it in the table view or switch back.
kanbanView.missingSortField: Kanban view needs the "{{field}}" column to keep card ordering.
kanbanView.dragHint: Drag cards to reorder within a lane or move them across lanes.
kanbanView.laneReorderHint: Drag a lane header to reorder columns.
kanbanView.dragUnavailable: Drag interactions are disabled because the required module failed to load. Refresh the note or reinstall the plugin to restore kanban drag-and-drop.
kanbanView.emptyState: No cards yet. Add rows from the table view to populate this board.
kanbanView.emptyStateFiltered: No cards match the current filters.
kanbanView.laneNotConfigured: Choose a kanban column from the toolbar to start using the board.

fieldModal.title: Select kanban column
fieldModal.description: Pick the column whose values should form the lanes in the kanban board.
fieldModal.schemaUnavailable: Load the table first before choosing a kanban column.
fieldModal.noColumns: No available columns to use as kanban lanes.

lanePresetModal.title: Create lane
lanePresetModal.description: Name a lane for the "{{field}}" column; it will appear even before any cards exist.
lanePresetModal.fieldDescription: Use a unique value so cards dropped here can reuse it.
lanePresetModal.emptyError: Enter a lane name before continuing.
lanePresetModal.statusFieldBlocked: Status lanes already cover the Status column. Edit the Status options in the table instead.
lanePresetModal.missingLaneField: Pick a kanban column before creating a new lane.

cardCreateModal.title: New entry
cardCreateModal.description: Fill the fields below to create a row directly in this lane.
cardCreateModal.laneFieldDesc: Cards created here use "{{lane}}" as their lane value by default.
cardCreateModal.laneRequiredError: Enter a lane value before creating an entry.

content.showBodyToggleDesc: When disabled, the body appears as a hover tooltip.
content.tagsBelowBodyToggleDesc: Keep unchecked to show tags next to the title.

toolbar.deleteBoardConfirm: Delete "{{name}}"? Cards remain available from other boards.
toolbar.laneFieldMissingNotice: The kanban board no longer has a valid lane column. Pick a new column to continue.
toolbar.noBoardsPlaceholder: No kanban boards yet. Use the + button to create one.
toolbar.laneWidthDescription: Enter a value between {{min}} and {{max}} rem to control the column width.
toolbar.initialVisibleCountDesc: Show this many cards in each lane before revealing the rest.
toolbar.sortSettingDesc: Choose a column and direction to order cards within each lane.
toolbar.fontScaleDescription: Enter a value between {{min}} and {{max}} to scale titles, body text, tags, and tooltips.

settings.multiRowToggle: Allow lanes to wrap into multiple rows

slideView.emptyState: No slides yet. Add H2 headings to this note.

templateModal.modeSingleDesc: Generates a single slide per row. Displays text and image side-by-side if an image exists.
templateModal.modeSplitDesc: Generates two sequential slides per row: 1. Text slide -> 2. Image slide (if image exists).
templateModal.title: Slide template
templateModal.titleFieldDesc: Use placeholders like {Title} to build the slide title.
templateModal.bodyFieldsDesc: Use placeholders like {Description} on separate lines; empty lines are skipped.
templateModal.yamlViewDesc: Copy or paste YAML to migrate or reuse this slide template.
templateModal.pastePresetInvalid: Clipboard data is not a valid slide preset.
templateModal.clipboardUnavailable: Clipboard is unavailable in this context.
templateModal.setDefaultSuccess: Saved current slide template as the default.
templateModal.setDefaultError: Failed to save as default. Check the console for details.
templateModal.noGlobalDefault: No global default preset is available yet.

csv.importFailure: Failed to import the CSV file. Check the console for details.
csv.createFailure: Failed to create a table from the CSV file.
csv.importNoHeaders: The CSV file is missing a header row.
csv.importNoRows: The CSV file does not contain any rows to import.

settings.hideRightSidebarLabel: Hide right sidebar in TileLineBase views
settings.hideRightSidebarDesc: Collapse Obsidian's right sidebar whenever any TileLineBase view is active, then restore the previous state after leaving.
settings.loggingLevelDesc: Choose how much detail TileLineBase logs to the developer console. Higher levels help debugging but are noisier.
settings.navigatorCompatDesc: When enabled and Notebook Navigator is installed, block its redundant reopen of the current TileLineBase view to prevent flicker. Off by default for compliance.
settings.backupEnableDesc: Capture a snapshot before writing Markdown so you can roll back accidental changes.
settings.backupCapacityDesc: When the total size exceeds this limit, the oldest snapshots are deleted. Default: 200 MB.

errors.nonFiniteResult: Result is not a finite number

columnEditorModal.timeFormatDescription: Choose how time values are shown in the grid.

magicMigration.previewEmpty: No matches yet. Adjust the template to highlight the fields you want.
magicMigration.previewNoiseHint: Content that does not match the template will be ignored automatically

magicMigration.errorInvalidPattern: The template could not be compiled. Please simplify it.

magicMigration.previewRenameHint: Click table headers to rename columns.
magicMigration.malformedDescription: Some H2 sections are missing key/value pairs. Edit them below or ignore to continue.
magicMigration.malformedReasonMissingColon: Heading must include a colon separating key and value.
magicMigration.malformedReasonInvalidField: Heading must contain both a key and a value.
magicMigration.malformedEditWarning: Changes here replace the original text for these sections.
magicMigration.malformedIgnoreWarning: Ignore once will remove these malformed sections and continue.
magicMigration.malformedSaveError: Failed to update malformed H2 sections.

onboarding.helpFileContent:
# Welcome to TileLineBase

## task: Complete your first TLB task

Action: Click the checkbox in the Status column to mark this task complete.

## task: Rearrange Kanban

Action: Click the Kanban icon (top-right), then drag this card into "Done" or another lane.

## task: Present Slides

Action: Click the Slides icon (top-right), then click the fullscreen button. Press `Tab` to view thumbnails.

## task: Explore Data Source

Action: Click the Edit icon (top-right) to return to the original Markdown view.

## task: Import CSV Data

Action: Click the gear icon (top-right), then select "Import CSV as New Table."
onboarding.createHelpFailed: TileLineBase failed to create the help document. Check the console for details.
onboarding.openHelpFailed: TileLineBase could not open the help document.
